block.p: LUDGIN--Chester. On August 9, 2003. An extraordinary American artist and musician. Leading Baritone of both the San Francisco Opera and the New York City Opera. Nominated for a Grammy for Leonard Bernstein's ''A Quiet Place:'' Creator of the role of John Proctor in Robert Ward's ''The Crucible'' and stars on the original recording. Services today August 10, 3 PM, at ''The Riverside,'' 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave.
